activities: SendGrid relays transactional and marketing emails on behalf of it's customers. SendGrid collects information directly from the users of our Site and Services.  We use this data to establish accounts, process orders, process payments and otherwise provide the Services for which we've been contracted.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor Program - http://www.the-dma.org/safeharbor
